          <language>en</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Debate on Mass Media - Task 3</string>
            <string language="en">Debate on Mass the mediums - Task 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Debattieren Sie auf Masse die Media - Aufgabe 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discutez sur la masse les medias - 
Chargez 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Debata na massa os media - tarefa 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dibatti su massa i media - l'operazione 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συζήτηση σχετικά με τη μάζα τα μέσα - στοιχειώδης 
εργασία 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Discuta sobre masa los media - tarea 3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Do we as citizens need protection in some way from any forms of mass media? Why? How? What about children? Do we risk losing the balance between real life and the mediated media life?Module 3 - Media.English C.</string>
            <string language="en">Do we carcasses citizens need protection in some way pious any mould's of mass the mediums? Why? How? What about children? Do we risk losing the balance between real life wild duck the mediated the mediums life?

Module 3 - the mediums.

English C.</string>
          </description>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sammeln wir irgendeiner Form des 
Karkassebürgernotwendigkeit Schutzes auf gewisse Weise pious von die 
Media an? Warum? Wie? Was über Kinder? wir 
riskieren, die Balance zwischen wildem Enteder realen Lebensdauer zu 
verlieren vermittelt dem Media life?Module 3 - das mediums.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est-ce que nous un moule de protection du besoin 
de citoyens de carcasses d'une manière quelconque pieux de amassons 
les medias ? Pourquoi ? Comment ? Que diriez-vous 
des enfants ? nous risquons de détruire l'équilibre entre 
sauvage de canard dans la réalité négocié le life?Module 3 de 
medias - le mediums.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós proteção da necessidade dos cidadãos das 
carcaças algum algum molde da maneira em pious de reunimos os media? 
Por que? Como? Que sobre crianças? nós 
arriscamos perder o contrapeso entre selvagem do pato da vida real 
mediado o life?Module 3 dos media - o mediums.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Della muffa di protezione di bisogno dei cittadini
delle carcasse in qualche modo pious di ammassiamo i media? 
Perchè? Come? Che cosa circa i bambini? rischiamo perdere l'equilibrio fra selvaggio dell'anatra nella realtà
mediato il life?Module 3 di media - il mediums.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προστασία ανάγκης πολιτών σφαγίων με κάποιο τρόπο 
ευσεβής οποιασδήποτε φόρμας μαζεύουμε τα μέσα; Γιατί; 
Πώς; Τι γίνεται με τα παιδιά; Διακινδυνεύουμε 
την ισορροπία μεταξύ της πραγματικής άγριας πάπιας ζωής 
μεσολαβημένη τα μέσα life?Module 3 - τα μέσα αγγλικό γ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Protección de la necesidad de los ciudadanos de
las caparazones en algún molde de la manera piadoso de formamos los 
media? ¿Por qué? ¿Cómo? ¿Qué sobre niños? arriesgamos el perder del equilibrio entre salvaje del pato de la vida
verdadera mediado el life?Module 3 de los media - el mediums.English 
C.</string>
          </description>
